alert.note: Alert for Burke; Columbia; McDuffie; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:33PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central McDuffie, southwestern Columbia, northwestern Burke and southwestern Richmond Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harlem, or 10 miles southeast of Thomson, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grovetown, Evans, Thomson, Harlem, Appling, Riverwood, Blythe, Dearing, Keysville, Liberty Park Community Center, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville, White Oak Campground, Boneville, Autney, Columbia County Jail, Ansley Mill, Leitner Lake Conference Center and Blanchard Woods Park. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 172 and 191. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
